program.name: Goodgame Empire - Non Incentivized
program.description:
Browser game

Become the lord of a castle and turn your small fortress into the capital of the entire kingdom in this exciting online strategy game. Establish an efficient economic system and assemble a mighty army to defend your realm and extend your territory. Forge alliances with other players worldwide to crush your enemies, and become the sole ruler of a mighty empire!

Target group: male, between 13 - 35 years

Flow: Single Optin: can create avatar but dont have to, fill in username, email address, password, accept T&Cs
program.restrictions:
** This program is live under budget, please contact your account manager.
Publishers who can send sub_id's, please send via DP2, numeric values only.

Displaying GOODGAMES creatives on websites violating or infringing the respectively applicable laws and regulations is not allowed. Additionally, GOODGAMES may send Advertising Party a ‘blacklist’ containing exemplary websites.
** Displaying GOODGAMES creatives on websites which include, refer to or link directly or indirectly to content unsuitable for persons under 18 year olds including online gambling with real money, nudity and pornography, cigarettes and alcohol and drugs is not allowed.
Valid Conversion Criteria:Flow: fill in username, email address, password, accept T&CsAPPROVAL OF CREATIVES: Only creatives provided by GOODGAMES may be utilized by the Affiliate/Publisher Party. Creatives created by the Affiliate/Publisher Party, need to be pre-approved in writing (email) by GOODGAMES. In particular use of ads with sound is prohibited under this agreement.
Search (Bing) restrictions:Bidding on the brand "Goodgame Studios" and/or any combination of this as well as typing mistakes are not allowed. The same applies for all games of Goodgame Studios.List of negative Keywords:goodgame Empire,goodgame Mafia, goodgame Cafe, goodgame Farm Fever, goodgame Farmer, goodgame Poker, goodgame Fashion, goodgame DiscoJump Jupiter, goodgame Jump JupiterMust book these keywords as negatives (excluding keywords and if possible with the option 'broad') so they won't be added automatically by the search network.FRAUD detection:  fraud will be evaluated according to several parameters:• player activity (mostly none activity at all)• registration name • mail address• combination of mail address and registration name• time stamp • ip address
Do NOT use iFrame placements

program.name: OLX - CR|GT|EC|SV|KE|BR|IN|AR - iOS - Non Incent
program.description:
Start using the #1 Free Classifieds App!
The best way to buy and sell 'on the go' and in your local area.

OLX allows you to easily post your ads for free and search for classified ads in your local area. Whether it is a flat screen TV, mobile phones, electronics, used cars, an apartment to rent, or a second-hand piece of furniture, OLX provides you with millions of buyers and sellers to connect to, all for free!

• Super simple ad posting: take a picture with your phone camera, describe your ad and sell it.
• Easily search and browse for classifieds around you using your phone's location.
• Manage your ads, favorites and messages on the go with "My OLX"
• Share your ads with everyone through Facebook, Whatsapp, Twitter, etc.
program.restrictions:
Each publisher is limited to a daily cap of 250 installs/geo - please contact your AM for additional budgets.


Publishers have to pass their sub ID's via the dp3 parameter within their unique tracking URL of the campaign.

For example:

http://network.adsmarket.com/click/imVylY2fgZSPZmrEXsp6w4picplhnIOVt2drlWade8OJYm6eX5ypnI5hcZ5f?dp=xxx&dp2=yyy&dp3=[PASS YOUR SUB ID HERE]

New publishers start with 300 leads per day per program
program.countries: AR, BR, CO, CR, EC, SV, GT, IN, KE, NG, ZA

program.name: VideoStripe - Intl' - Non Incent - OLFA
program.description:
EXCLUSIVE RATES

Offer Review:    
Video-on-demand service containing only legal contents attractive up-to-date movie database
Easy sign up with a 2-week free trial, after which the account can be prolonged for $49,99 per month
24/7 professional support at customers disposal
no binding periods – account cancellation in a few easy steps account fully free of advertisements
approaching customers all over the world


Affiliate Benefits:    
International Campaign, amazing rate! Higher rates available for high-performing affiliates, at the advertiser's discretion.

User Flow:    
User submits valid email, password and password confirmation. User then submits valid payment details
to sign up for a free trial. CPA conversion occurs once user submits valid payment details.

Typical Demographics:    
All
program.restrictions:
Please note: New publishers are limited to a daily cap of 40 leads a day until approved.

Traffic: Worldwide (except for the following geos: PL, IR, IN, CN, ID).

Mobile: exclude traffic from Opera Mini

Valid Conversion Criteria:
User submits valid email, password and password confirmation. User then submits valid payment details
to sign up for a free trial. CPA conversion occurs once user submits valid payment details.

Brazilian dating site

program.name: eGentic - IN - Non incent. SOI
program.description:
Try Planet 49 - Great sweepstakes, great conversions.

User- flow single opt in: User has to participate in the whole registration process and therefore has to fill out the complete registration form of the first two pages. The pixel fires after the second page is submitted.

Approval frequency:  Leads would be approved once a month.

Leads which counted and the user will unsubscribe within 72 hours  will NOT be considered as valid leads by the advertiser.

program.description:
Offer Review:    
A mobile content offer with several pages for IN

Affiliate Benefits:    
Higher rates available for high-performing affiliates, at the advertiser's discretion.

Step 2: User Clicks Yes to confirm subscription and pixel is fired

ALL

Browsers: no Opera,  no UCWeb , no Nokia OVI

Carriers: Idea, Airtel (according to the campaign name)  - adult allowed.

Must exclude wifi.

Publishers running adult traffic must block traffic from youporn.com.

program.name: RealPlayer-INTL-OLFA-Non Incent
program.description:
Offer Review:    
Download videos 3X faster from video websites
Watch your PC videos on your TV wirelessly
Access to all RealPlayer Cloud premium features - $50 value
+100GB of personal video cloud storage

Mobile web traffic only.

Affiliate Benefits:    
Higher rates available for high-performing affiliates, at the advertiser's discretion.

User Flow:    
1. User gets to the sign up page.
2. User needs to create an account (First name, Last name, Email, Password and accept t&c)
3. User needs to enter his payments details.
4. User confirms the $1.99 payment for the service.
5. The user is subscribed and the conversion occurs.

Typical Demographics:    
ALL
program.restrictions:
OLFA offer - web&mobile traffic from same link.
traffic from WW is accepted excluding Russia.

In order to run this offer with Adwords, please contact your account manager

program.name: GoalUnited - Int'l - non incentivized
program.description:
Browser game

Sophisticated football manager with premier league graphics!

In goalunited, millions of players control the fate of their virtual soccer team with just one objective – make it to the top of the table with tactics, patience and skill.

Flow: DOI - verify email address
program.restrictions:
Traffic only allowed from countries set as campaigns!

Please note: publishers have to cap to 30 leads/day/market

Only affiliates who agreed to Travian addendum can access the links! Here's the link for the addendum -

http://mockup.tsxnrey.com/9096-Travian_publisher_addendum_20101015.DOC

program.name: Sexy-IN-Non Incent-Wap-ADT
program.description:
Offer Review:    
A mobile content offer for IN with several landing pages for Wap.

Affiliate Benefits:    
Higher rates available for high-performing affiliates, at the advertiser's discretion.

User Flow:    
Step 1: User clicks on the Banner and is redirected to the landing page.
Step 2: User clicks on the Subscribe/Yes button on the landing page. Once the user is successfully billed, the pixel is fired.

Typical Demographics:    ALL

Recomended targeting: Airtel, Idea/Tata-Dokomo, Vodafone.
has very law CR on wifi
program.restrictions:
Adult traffic is not allowed for Vodafone!!!

Carriers:
Airtel, Idea/Tata-Dokomo, Vodafone.
Note: each campaign should be targeted  for users from the correct carrier (listed in the campaign name).


Creative Restrictions: Publishers may use their own creative but must include price point on it. Our product price point is
5 INR (@5 or @Rs5/Day)

Restrictions: No iOS
for Airtel campaigns:Nokia S 40,Nokia Lumia / Windows , Opera, Wi-fi, UC web, IOS (I Phone), RIM (black berry ) & Maui are excluded.


Adult Traffic is allowed

program.name: Hello1-IN-Non Incent-Wap
program.description:
Offer Review:    
A mobile content offer for IN with Wap pages.

Affiliate Benefits:    
Higher rates available for high-performing affiliates, at the advertiser's discretion.

User Flow:    
1. User Clicks on Banner and lands on consent page. The he clicks on "YES" and if he/she is a billable user pixel fires and he/she will land to the confirmation page.
2. User Clicks Yes to confirm subscription and pixel is fired

Typical Demographics:    
ALL
program.restrictions:
Carriers: Airtel & Vodafone ONLY
TARGETED OS's : Android, J2ME TARGETED Devices : Smartphones / Tablets / Feature-phonesTARGETED Genre's : Glamour / Adult, Non-Glam;  Non-IncentTARGETED Inventory-type : WAP-only
EXCLUDE Browsers : Opera, UCBrowser, Nokia (S40)

program.name: RedLP- intl' -Non Incent-MAC
program.description:
Offer Review:    
A download offer for US/CA/UK/DE/FR/AU with Media Player HD installation.

Affiliate Benefits:    
Higher rates available for high-performing affiliates, at the advertiser's discretion.

User Flow:    
User arrives on landing page, clicks to download then runs and installs product. Conversion will fire once a user downloads and successfully installs products onto his computer.

Typical Demographics:    
ALL
